Text: That 'Stink' bloke is a fuckwit . Ask the other guys in the Band - they would agree with me . Joe Strummer said he was a wanker ! Joe wasn't that sensible but I think he nails him . Lot's of my Jamaican Brothers and Sisters think he is a fucking robber too....

^^^ I always thought he was a pompous ass.... can't deny the solid music the three of them made though.  I attribute much of their rawness to the fact they almost always were fighting with one another.... that tension came out in the music.
